timeline.message: Prevent overflow and null pointers + small code enhancements

timeline.bodyText: Potential overflow in 2 Values before it is converted to long by use in an invocation context.
timeline.author: GabrielBrascher

timeline.bodyText: The variable 'quitetime' is only assigned values of primitive type and is never 'null', but it is declared with the boxed type 'Integer'.
timeline.author: GabrielBrascher

timeline.bodyText: currentVmDiskStats might be null as well.
timeline.author: GabrielBrascher

replies.author: ustcweizhou

replies.bodyText: Just updated the code addressing your comment, @ustcweizhou. Thanks for the heads up 👍
replies.author: GabrielBrascher

timeline.message: Prevent overflow + add small code enhancements
Prevent overflow on StatsCollector + add a few enhancements on code
